name: Jaydis
title: God of Harmony and Balance
dogma: Seek balance in all things. Mediate conflict and promote understanding. Protect the equilibrium of the world.

name: Maya
title: Goddess of Day and Light
dogma: Bask in the light of day. Uphold truth and righteousness. Vanquish darkness and reveal deceit.

name: Solaren
title: Goddess of Truth and Clarity
symbol: An unblinking eye within a crystal
dogma: Seek truth above all else, even when inconvenient. Clarity reveals the path forward. Lies obscure and weaken.

name: Vivarakan
title: Lord of Beginning and Vitality
symbol: A sprouting seed engulfed in green flame
dogma: Embrace new beginnings and the vitality of life. Change is growth. Stagnation is death. Live with passion.

name: Zithra
title: God of Warmth and Pleasure
dogma: Seek joy and comfort. Share warmth and companionship. Life's simple pleasures are its greatest gifts.

name: Apsen
title: Goddess of Travel and Crossroads
symbol: A compass rose with winding paths
dogma: The journey is as important as the destination. Embrace the unknown path. Opportunity waits at the crossroads.

name: Auroris
title: Deity of Nature and Weather
symbol: A swirling vortex of leaves and lightning
dogma: Nature is wild and untamed, both beautiful and destructive. Respect its power and cycles. Adapt to the changing winds.

name: Julevir
title: God of Inspiration and Creativity
dogma: Create beauty and marvels. Inspire others through art and invention. Innovation drives the world forward.

name: Jun
title: Deity of Dreams and Illusions
symbol: A swirling mist revealing fleeting images
dogma: Reality is subjective. Dreams hold hidden truths. Illusion can be a tool or a weapon. Question what you see.

name: Mabu
title: Entity of Chaos and Entropy
dogma: Order is a lie. Embrace chaos and the inevitable decay. True freedom lies in unraveling the structures of reality.

name: Ocea
title: Goddess of the Seas and Tides
dogma: The sea is vast, deep, and ever-changing. Respect its power and mysteries. Go with the flow, but beware the undertow.

name: Alfind
title: Deity of Ending and Closure
dogma: All things must end. Accept closure and the finality of fate. There is peace in conclusion.

name: Defenestria
title: Goddess of Frost and Pain
symbol: A shard of ice piercing a frozen heart
dogma: Pain sharpens the senses and strengthens the spirit. Embrace the cold clarity of suffering. Weakness is purged by hardship.

name: Lolth
title: Lady of Trickery and War
dogma: Weave schemes like a web. Exploit weakness and seize power. Trust no one. Chaos and conflict are ladders to ascend.

name: Noxtum
title: Lord of the Night and Shadows
dogma: Secrets thrive in darkness. Control the night and its hidden paths. Order can be maintained through fear and shadow.

name: Sable
title: Lady of Silence and Reflection
symbol: A still, dark pool of water
dogma: Silence holds wisdom. Seek introspection and understanding in quiet moments. Reflection reveals the true self.
